explains: n. 估价者；评定等级的人

sentences.en: He had deemed the TRANSCONTINENTAL a first-rater.
sentences.cn: 他曾把《横贯大陆》看作一流杂志。

sentences.en: I'd rater walk or run to work.
sentences.cn: 我宁可步行或跑步上班。

sentences.en: If barriers are too low, however, issuers will go rating-shopping to the laxest rater.
sentences.cn: 但如果门槛过低，证券的发行者将涌向最宽松的评级机构。
